REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0232 reute d f BC-PACE-MEMBERSHIP-<PMWI 03-06 0057

TEXT.TITLE: PACE MEMBERSHIP <PMWI> BUYS BACK NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Pace Membership Warehouse Inc said it made a series of recent purchases of its 13 pct subordinated notes totaling about 13.6 mln dlrs. It said the amount of notes originally issued totaled 60 mln dlrs. Pace also said it may purchase additional outstanding notes in the future. Reuter
